publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5061 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees that— (a) for the purposes of allowing the meeting of the Parliament on Thursday 2 November 2006 to continue beyond 5.30 pm, the word "Wednesday" in Rules 2.2.4 and 2.2.5(c) be suspended and that the word "Thursday" be substituted for it in each place, and that Rule 2.2.5(a) be suspended; (b) under Rule 2.2.4 thus varied, the meeting of the Parliament on Thursday 2 November 2006 may continue to 7.00 pm; and (c) Decision Time on Thursday 2 November 2006 shall begin at 6.00 pm. Supported by: George Lyon*
